name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-msgext-ai-sentiment-analysis-python
title: Sentiment analysis of Teams chat message using messaging extension and Azure Open AI
shortDescription: This sample allows users to analyze the sentiment of chat messages in Teams using a messaging extension integrated with Open AI.
longDescription: This sample allows users to assess the sentiment of messages in Teams chats by utilizing a messaging extension integrated with Open AI. The analysis categorizes messages as positive, negative, or neutral, enhancing understanding of team interactions.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing sentiment analysis for Team's chat messages using messaging extension and Azure Open AI

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
